Alphah::

"This unfair..."sobbed Alphah who still was watching Azure Blade's 
body, she moved and saw the spark "Azure is it you???" the femme 
tried to take the spark, she knew that she must be careful if she did 
it in order to don't turn off the spark "it is you my friend?? 
Perhaps I can help you to come back your body... well it is pretty 
damaged but Cr can fix it"

The femme said that while she tried to take the spark.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> The spark tried to talk, but only in the Matrix could it be heard.
> 
> Spark: Them... the scientists seem to have acheived their goal... 
They 
> have created another Starscream... and I AM HE!!!!!! NEVER!!!! I do 
> not want this!
> 
> It saw Alpha Dolphy. He felt sorry for having left the body but 
> somehow, he wondered if she could even know he was there. He came 
> closer.
> 
> Spark: I am... sorry, my friend, I did not want to be destroyed... 
> forgive me...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Alpha Dolphy::
> > 
> > Alpha Left the cr, she felt dizzy and weak. She walked some steps 
> > trying to leave the Cr's room. She horrified looked all 
destruction 
> > around "What the Matrix happened here!!!" shouted the femme (The 
> cr's 
> > area where she was hadn't received damage).  
> > 
> > 
> > "NOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!" shouted the young maximal.
> > 
> > she looked the damaged body of Azure Blade and ran towards 
it "DON'T 
> > DIE, DON'T DIE!!!!" said sobbing Alphah, she didn't see Azure 
> Blade's 
> > spark
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > 
> > 
> > > OOC: First off, does Rampage's controller got anything about 
the 
> > link 
> > > between AzureBlade and him (protoform X and Z)?
> > > 
> > > BIC: The spark rose from the ruins of the CR chambers in 
Maximal 
> > city. 
> > > It stopped about three feet from the ground. After a few 
moments, 
> > it 
> > > went flying in the blue.
> > > 
> > > Spark: Freeeeee!!!!!! Ah! This feels good! I don't even need my 
> > wings 
> > > to fly!
> > > 
> > > It came down from where it came. A destroyed robotic body layed 
on 
> > the 
> > > floor. It was AzureBlade's
> > > 
> > > Spark: WHA...? How can I see myself? Am I hurt so bad? Am I 
just a 
> > > spark? NO! IT CAN'T BE!!!!!!
> > > 
> > > The spark remained there, looking at its old body.
